CustomField.description: The statement t that most accurately reflects the studentâ€™s status in regards to preferential treatment in the event of a lottery for enrollment
CustomField.label: FL StudentStatus

value.fullName: My child is a resident of the Hillsborough School District.
value.label: My child is a resident of the Hillsborough School District.

value.fullName: My child is enrolling in the school because of a relocation due to a foster care placement in a different school zone.
value.label: My child is enrolling in the school because of a relocation due to a foster care placement in a different school zone.

value.fullName: My student attended or was assigned to a failing school pursuant to s. 1002.38.
value.label: My student attended or was assigned to a failing school pursuant to s. 1002.38.

value.fullName: My student is a dependent child of active duty military personnel of any branch of the United States Armed Forces (includes students that moved to Florida as a result of military orders).
value.label: My student is a dependent child of active duty military personnel of any branch of the United States Armed Forces (includes students that moved to Florida as a result of military orders).

value.fullName: My student is applying because of a move due to a court ordered change in custody relating to separation or divorce, or the serious illness or death of a custodial parent.
value.label: My student is applying because of a move due to a court ordered change in custody relating to separation or divorce, or the serious illness or death of a custodial parent.

value.fullName: My student is the child of a member of the governing board of Florida Connections Academy.
value.label: My student is the child of a member of the governing board of Florida Connections Academy.

value.fullName: My student is the child of an employee of Florida Connections Academy.
value.label: My student is the child of an employee of Florida Connections Academy.

value.fullName: None of these situations apply to my student.
value.label: None of these situations apply to my student.
